name: Clicteq
slogan: Bringning Enterprise Class Ad Tech to Ambitious SMBs
description: Google API and Script Development, Paid Search Management Services

jobs.title: PPC manager / operations manager
jobs.description:
We're Clicteq and we're building the paid search agency of the future.

We love automating boring PPC tasks with Adwords Scripts to make your life easier and we've even built features into Adwords using the API for our clients.

Since being launched off 13 months ago we have grown rapidly on the back of a raft of clients wins and are now looking to bring on our first team member.

We’re looking for an entrepreneurial type of person who is suited to working in a small team environment and wants to be part of building a growing, disruptive startup.

What we would like you to do...

- Deliver incredibly successful PPC campaigns.
- Work with our tech stack to deliver custom functionality within Adwords using Adwords Script and the API.
- Assist with new business pitches
- Assist with onboarding clients.
- Improve client retention and run quarterly net promoter score surveys.
- Assist with hiring and building out PPC team.

Here is what we will do for you...

- Flexible working that fits around your life.
- Friday Drinks
- A Clicteq BFF (mentor scheme)
- Ongoing training and development
- Clear goals and ongoing feedback
- Competitive salary (£23 - 30K DOE)

Job Requirements

- No PPC experience required as full training will be provided. 1-2 years experience in PPC would be preferable
- A degree from a top university
- A consultative approach & great project management skills.
- Be remarkable, we are looking for people who can change things and can help shape the future of paid media.

Sound like the sort of place you could see yourself working? Apply today.

skills: Google AdWords and Google Display Network
